channel.title: PBS News Hour
channel.desc: Co-anchors Amna Nawaz and Geoff Bennett and correspondents offer in-depth analysis of current events.

channel.name: Detroit Public TV US
channel.title: BBC News The Context
channel.desc: A regular panel of guests from across the political spectrum discuss the biggest international stories of the day, along with news-making interviews and analysis from BBC correspondents around the globe.

channel.title: American Black Journal
channel.desc: Newsmakers and citizens discuss African-American history.

channel.title: American Experience
channel.desc: A profile of Franklin D. Roosevelt examines his first two presidential terms, response to the Great Depression, and management of World War II.

channel.name: Detroit Public TV US
channel.title: The American Revolution: An Inside Look
channel.desc: A look at the documentary series by Ken Burns that illustrates how the American Revolution came to life.

channel.title: POV
channel.desc: A journalist risks everything to expose an environmental catastrophe in a remote Siberian coal mining city.

channel.desc: Christiane Amanpour leads discussions about world issues and interviews with global leaders.

channel.name: Detroit Public TV US
channel.title: All New Rock, Pop and Doo Wop (My Music Presents)
channel.desc: Full-length performances from various artists of the 1950s and 1960s, including Johnny Maestro, The Duprees, Jay Black, Little Anthony & The Imperials, Ronnie Spector, Frankie Valli, Jerry Butler and more.

channel.name: Detroit Public TV US
channel.title: Deconstructing the Beatles
channel.desc: A look at milestone albums of The Beatles and the stories that accompanied them.

channel.name: Detroit Public TV US
channel.title: Rick Steves Mighty Alps
channel.desc: Rick Steves takes a European alpine adventure from Italy to Austria and Switzerland to France; locations include the Dolomites, Zugspitze, Matterhorn, Aiguille du Midi and the Tour du Mont Blanc hiking path.
